Episodes.Title: The Bullet or the Bear
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Ava Pickett, Constance Cheng
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Catherine and Peter seek some marriage guidance after the chaotic events of the previous day left them in an awkward place in their relationship.

Episodes.Title: Choose Your Weapon
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Ava Pickett, Constance Cheng
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Catherine is visited by the UK and US ambassadors both wanting her to intervene in the War of Independence. Maxim takes issue with the public displays of affection between Grigor and Marial.

Episodes.Title: You the People
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Ava Pickett, Constance Cheng
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Catherine involves the peasants, nobles and merchants in a conference designed to bring change to Russia. Peter's hunt for revenge on an historic enemy threatens to destabilize Catherine's attempt to outlaw murder.

Episodes.Title: Stag
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Fiona Seres, Ava Pickett
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Arkady and Tatyana help Peter and Catherine through a rough patch as they clash over their son, Paul, whom Catherine fears will grow up to be a ruthless leader and so refuses to ordain him, to the alarm of Archie and Elizabeth.

Episodes.Title: Sweden
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Ava Pickett, Constance Cheng
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Peter is once again tormented by his father's expectations and his failure to continue the legacy of his empire. Catherine must decide to do about the unrest being stirred up in the regions, but Velementov is in no state to help her.

Episodes.Title: Ice
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Ava Pickett, Constance Cheng
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Catherine tries to persuade Peter to come home whilst Hugo re-doubles his attempts to regain his kingdom. Georgina continues to play her complicated court games.

Episodes.Title: Fun
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Ava Pickett, Constance Cheng
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Catherine wants to bring more fun to the court, so she stages a festival of truth, jokes and stunningly clever ideas with Georgina's help. Katya puts on a play challenging Catherine's reign and Catherine samples Peter's salty dess...

Episodes.Title: Peter and the Wolf
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Ava Pickett, Constance Cheng
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Phoebe Fox, Charity Wakefield
Episodes.Plot: Catherine introduces divorce to the court with unforeseen consequences. Grigor befriends Maxim and takes him stag hunting, while Elizabeth and Petrov go on a trip to the regions.

Episodes.Title: Destiny
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Fiona Seres, Ava Pickett
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Catherine orders Grigor to hide out in the forest with Paul and plays a dangerous game with herself to prove that her destiny lies in Russia, while grappling with the impact Peter's decisions have on her rule.

Episodes.Title: Once Upon a Time
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Ava Pickett, Constance Cheng
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Court scientist Nikolai announces a comet is about to pass Russia, a phenomenon Catherine uses to her advantage while unearthing a new side of her leadership in the face of some huge challenges.
